title: U.S. owned assets abroad, excluding financial derivatives (increase/financial outflow (-)) (DISCONTINUED)
notes: This series has been discontinued as a result of the comprehensive restructuring of the international economic accounts (https://apps.bea.gov/scb/pdf/2014/07%20July/0714_annual_international_transactions_accounts.pdf).
